t: Amazon, UPS and FedEx: How Does the Story End? - eComFuel
s: June 30, 2021 - In this final episode from our beach mastermind group. Andrew moderates a discussion between Bill D’Alessandro of Elements Brands and Zack Kanter of Proforged about how Amazon will change in the coming years. Bill and Zack spar over whether Amazon will consider buying out either UPS or FedEx.
